name: Knight pack
description: Massive pack of 2d animated knight game characters. This pack includes a massive amount of puppet pieces and 8 fully animated knights ready for you to use in your game. There's also a fully rigged Spriter puppet for you to make more animations or swap out included parts. The maximum pixel dimensions of the included png format knights is 1500px. The eight included knights are much smaller at around 800px but you can always rexport them if you need bigger knights.
